subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The referee, Clete Blakeman, is a well regarded official who may be better known for his role in Deflategate and for recently messing up a coin toss.
snippet: The referee, Clete Blakeman, is a well regarded official who may be better known for his role in Deflategate and for recently messing up a coin toss.
